Package com.Akif

Class Data

java.lang.Object
com.Akif.Data
public class Data
extends java.lang.Object
This class keeps all data regarding the System. It also operate the data. It keeps data by using ArrayList. We wrote this class for reusable purpose, we will use this operation later.
